name: @junctionrelay/shader-plasma
description: Generative FBM plasma — swirling color fields driven by fractional Brownian motion, no texture input

junctionrelay.description: GPU-only generative plasma effect. Layered fractional Brownian motion creates swirling, organic color fields. Fully procedural — no texture input required. Custom uniforms control animation speed and two-tone color palette via sensor bindings.
